```{python}
#| label: fig-adpll-block-diagram
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Block diagram of an all-digital PLL. A reference phase signal is compared to the phase of a digitally-controlled oscillator (DCO) output signal in a time-to-digital converter (TDC). The phase error word is digitally low-pass filtered and used to tune the DCO frequency via a frequency control word."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    dsp.Oscillator()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit).label(r'$f_\mathrm{ref}$', 'top')
    pfd = dsp.Square().label(r'TDC', loc='center')
    elm.DataBusLine().length(d.unit).label('phase error\nword', 'top')
    dsp.Filter(response='lp')
    elm.DataBusLine().length(d.unit).label('tuning\nword', 'top')
    dsp.Oscillator().label('DCO', loc='top', ofst=(0, 0.2))
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.push()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).label(r'$f_\mathrm{out} = N \cdot f_\mathrm{ref}$', 'right')
    d.pop()
    dsp.Line().down(d.unit)
    dsp.Arrow().left(d.unit*1.5)
    dsp.Square().label(':N', loc='center')
    dsp.Line().tox(pfd.S).label(r'$f_\mathrm{fb} = f_\mathrm{out} / N$', 'top')
    dsp.Arrow().up().to(pfd.S)
```
